post_title: ‘Trump Nightmare’ Fuels Record Exodus of Americans to Spain
comment: This is not exodus its a stat on people buying property in spain.  It went up 57 to ~500 properties purchased across 400,000,000 Americans.  250 additional rich people able to afford a second home in Spain does not constitute an exodus.  As far as I can tell, none of them are even confirmed to be leaving America.  Theres a temporary one year visa available but this doesnt have any statics on how many of those 500 properties will include people actually moving there for a year vs just coming for their two week vacation on their oceanfront villa.

post_title: ‘Trump Nightmare’ Fuels Record Exodus of Americans to Spain
comment: Personally I think the country isn’t worth saving. Not only wasn’t it built on the oppression of black and brown people, we have maintained that oppression since our inception. It doesn’t matter if you’re republican or democrat because they’re all in bed together. Furthermore, even if racism wasn’t a core value of the country, capitalism is the rule of law. The dark money that flows through our government is tied into so many knots, it would take a long ass time to untangle even if we dismantled the whole system and started over. But that would require political and economically minded people to come forward and guide the country. We’ll be spiraling for years either way. Our education system needs to be dismantled and reworked as well. It was designed by Rockefeller to create factory workers and cogs in their capitalistic wheel not about really educating people. My mom and I both have chronic illnesses that would for sure put us in the gas chambers or leave us to rot in a camp but aside from that…what is there to even fight for?? Our amazing healthcare with doctors that gaslight you and insurance companies that fight you? Our inherently racist society? Running in the rat race to never make it anywhere with zero quality of life? No where is perfect but there’s got to be a better option than this. We may only have enough money to get somewhere and that’s going to have to be good enough because I don’t want to wait until the last minute and everyone’s scrambling. If I’m going to fight for survival it might as well be in a country worth living in.
